name: Wwdc.family
tagline: A location sharing group for an exciting WWDC week in San Francisco
body:
# wwdc.family

Let's start a location sharing group for an exciting WWDC week in San Francisco

## How does it work

Unfortunately Apple [removed the group feature](https://www.reddit.com/r/ipad/comments/2gzaju/has_temporary_disapeared_from_find_my_friends_in/) of the `Find my Friends` app.

As replacement we will use an iMessage group with location sharing enabled. You can opt-out any time.

## Register

[Fill out the Google Form](https://goo.gl/forms/sweIs0R63MUHWpIh1) and wait for further instructions. 

## Notes

Since we use an iMessage group, there will be potentially a lot of messages. I'd recommend muting the group.

## Ideas

If you have any ideas on how to make this experience the best possible, please get in touch with me on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/KrauseFx)

> Organised by [Felix Krause](https://krausefx.com). wwdc.family is not affiliated with Apple Inc.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
